seo: 华为USG,指纹检测,默认口令,弱口令,安全网关
seo_en: Huawei USG, fingerprint detection, default password, weak password, security gateway
summary: 检测华为USG设备的指纹信息和默认口令（admin/Admin@123），并判断是否存在弱口令风险以及可能的安全威胁。
summary_en: Detect fingerprint information and default credentials (admin/Admin@123) for Huawei USG devices, and assess potential weak password risks and security threats.
